document_data.title: The Call of the Wilde
document_data.mainbody: '''''The Call of the Wilde''''' is a two-round adventure module set in the [[Living City]] organized play program. It was published in 1995, and is intended for adventurers of all levels.
document_data.Index:
This adventure contains two rounds in two separate documents, which are indexed separately on these subpages:
* [[The Call of the Wilde/Round One|Round One]]
* [[The Call of the Wilde/Round Two|Round Two]]
